text: Tapa'i bhannus ki timimathi timra mathibata va khutta munibata kunai sajaya patha'una u saksama cha. Athava timiharula'i vibhinna samuhama vibhajita gari jhagada gara'ihalos ra timro apasako bhidantako svada cakha'ihalos. Hernus hamile aphna ayataharula'i kunaâ€“kuna tarikale varnana gardachaum taki yiniharu bujhna sakun
